Sohee

RIIZE

Introduction

Sohee is a South Korean singer under SM Entertainment and a member of the boy group RIIZE. He made his debut on September 4th, 2023, with the single album "Get A Guitar".

Mnet announced, on January 5, 2025, that Sohee along with BOYNEXTDOOR's Jaehyun have been selected as MCs of "M Countdown" alongside ZEROBASEONE's Sung Hanbin. Their first appearance was on the January 11th broadcast.
